long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple QR code generator that generates a QR code based  off on what website are you or the text you input. 

• Supports dark and light theme (changes based of your device preferences)
• Download generated QR code in 512x512 PNG quality
• Advanced QR Generator option
• Open source
